extendedInfo.description: If you are TobyMac's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check TobyMac's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all TobyMac's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of TobyMac's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)************************Main Features ************************- Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics************************List of albums ************************- Momentum- Welcome To Diverse City- Portable Sounds- Tonight- Christmas In Diverse City- Eye On It************************List of lyrics ************************- All In (Letting Go) / Mr. Talkbox Interlude- Angels We Have Heard On High- Atmosphere- Atmosphere (Remix)- Birth Of Love- Boomin' / Opera Trip Interlude- Break Open The Sky- Burn For You- Captured- Carol Of The Kings- Catchafire (Whoopsi-Daisy)- Changed Forever- Christmas This Year- Christmas Time- City On Our Knees- Diverse City- Do You Know- Don't Bring Me Down- Extreme Days- Eye On It- Face Of The Earth / Chuck @ Artist Development Interlude- Family- Favorite Song- Feelin' So Fly- Forgiveness- Fresher Than A Night At The W- Funky Jesus Music- Get Back Up- Get This Party Started- Getaway Car- Gone- Gotta Go- Hey Devil- Hey Now- Hold On- Hype Man (Trudog '07)- Ignition- Ill-M-I- I'm For You- In The Air- Irene- It Snowed- J Train- Little Drummer Boy- Lose My Soul- Lose Myself- LoudNClear- Love Is In The House- Mac Daddy (Tru's Reality)- Made For Me- Made To Love- Mary's Boy Child- Me Without You- Momentum- No Ordinary Love- No Signal- O Come All Ye Faithful- One World- Phenomenon- Poetically Correct- Quiet Storm- Santa'scomin'baka'round!- ShowStopper- Somebody's Watching- Speak Life- Start Somewhere- Steal My Show- Stories (Down to the Bottom)- Suddenly- Thankful For You- The First Noel- The Slam- This Christmas (Father Of The Fatherless)- Toby's Mac- Tonight- Triple Skinny- Tru - Dog- TruDog: The Return- Unstoppable- What Child Is This?- What's Goin' Down- Wonderin'- Wonderin' Why- Yours

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I am realy thankful for the person who made this app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Wow amazing!  Thank you!  Toby Mac is my favourite singer!
reviews.author: A Google User
